data.name: StrDrawLineModeInstruction
data.value: Left / right mouse button to set / clear point, 'next>' to switch line

data.name: StrDrawPolygonModeInstruction
data.value: Left / right mouse button to set / clear point, 'next>' to switch area

data.name: StrDrawSamplePointsModeInstruction
data.value: Left / right mouse button to set / clear object

data.name: StrEditSamplesModeInstruction
data.value: Catch corner of shape/image and press left mouse button to move it

data.name: StrMapAdaptModeEndInstruction
data.value: All points are set, change last position or click on other map to adapt

data.name: StrMapAdaptModeSetInstruction
data.value: Left mouse button to set or change source/destination position on map

data.name: StrMapServerModeInstruction
data.value: Adjust the map and press Add or Save, or Load to get a map from file

data.name: StrOpenFileDialog
data.value: Please select image or geometry objects file

data.name: StrSaveImageDialog
data.value: Please select a file name for the image

data.name: StrSaveShapeDialog
data.value: Please select a file name for the geometry objects

data.name: StrShiftCanvasModeInstruction
data.value: Press left mouse button to shift or use slider to zoom working area

data.name: ttButtonAdd
data.value: Add current map or shape to sample list.

data.name: ttButtonLoad
data.value: Load a map or a shape from file.

data.name: ttButtonMultiShape
data.value: Press to finish the current area or line and add another one.

data.name: ttButtonSave
data.value: Save current Google map to file and add it to sample list.\r\nSave all visible shapes from sample list to file.

data.name: ttCheckBoxFill
data.value: Check to change the fill color or transparency of the current sample.

data.name: ttCheckBoxStroke
data.value: Check to change the stroke color or transparency of the current sample.

data.name: ttComboBoxBrushes
data.value: Select a color of the list for the current sample.

data.name: ttRadioButtonAdapt
data.value: Adapt the coordinates of the currently loaded map using the reference background map \r\nby clicking 3 reference points alternatingly on both maps. \r\nA final click places the current map to the right position.

data.name: ttRadioButtonArea
data.value: Draw an area (polygon) by clicking the points with left mouse button.

data.name: ttRadioButtonEdit
data.value: Move corner points of all visible samples by catch and drag them with the cursor.

data.name: ttRadioButtonLine
data.value: Draw a line by clicking the points with left mouse button.

data.name: ttRadioButtonMap
data.value: Connect to Google map service to get a map of your region.

data.name: ttRadioButtonObjects
data.value: Draw sampling objects by clicking the points with left mouse button.

data.name: ttRadioButtonShift
data.value: Shift drawing area pressing left mouse button \r\nor zoom area by using the slider.

data.name: ttSliderZoom
data.value: Zoom function when in Shift mode, transparency function when in other modes.\r\nDouble-click to reset to default value.

data.name: ErrCoordsNotVisible
data.value: WARNING!\r\nLoaded image coordinates are outside the reference map area.\r\nThe image might not be visible.

data.name: ErrLongitude
data.value: WARNING:\r\nThe longitude range of the image coordinates is not consistent (180° line)!\r\nGeometry objects can not be positioned at the correct place!

data.name: ErrNoWorldCoords
data.value: ERROR:\r\nWorld coordinates could not be retrieved.\r\nPlease move the map and add it again!

data.name: ErrLatitude
data.value: WARNING:\r\nThe latitude of the map edge is beyond {0}° (north or south)!\r\nGeometry objects in this region may not be positioned at the correct place.

data.name: ErrAltitude
data.value: WARNING!\r\nCould not connect to geonames server to get the altitude coordinates!

data.name: ErrMissingReferenceMap
data.value: ERROR:\r\nNo reference map with world coordinates available!

data.name: ErrNoReferenceMap
data.value: ERROR:\r\nNo reference map available, cannot save working area.

data.name: ErrNotSuitableAsReferenceMap
data.value:
WARNING!
The map cannot be used as a reference map,
because it is not aligned to north direction!
Please create a Google map first and load the map again.

data.name: ErrTooManyPoints
data.value: WARNING!\r\nThe shapes consist of {0} points.Saving them will take very long. Save anyway?

data.name: ErrSaveSample
data.value: WARNING!\r\nChanging the drawing mode will delete your current sample!\r\nDo you wish to add it to the sample list?

data.name: ErrDeleteAllSamples
data.value: WARNING!\r\nThis will delete all samples of the sample list, except the reference map!\r\nDo you want to continue?

data.name: ttButtonDeleteAll
data.value: Delete all samples of the sample list, except the reference map.

data.name: ttButtonSettings
data.value: Open a window to adjust specific settings of the editor.

data.name: SettingsCheckBoxSaveWorkingArea
data.value: Save Working Area as a screen shot (.png)

data.name: SettingsLabelImageCoordFileFormats
data.value: Save Image coordinates in following file formats:

data.name: SettingsLabelShapeFileFormats
data.value: Save Shapes in following file formats:

data.name: ttSettingsSliderStrokeThicknessArea
data.value: Adjust the stroke thickness of Area objects.\r\nDouble-click to reset to default value.

data.name: ttSettingsSliderStrokeThicknessLine
data.value: Adjust the stroke thickness of Line objects.\r\nDouble-click to reset to default value.

data.name: ttSettingsSliderStrokeThicknessPoint
data.value: Adjust the stroke thickness of Point objects.\r\nDouble-click to reset to default value.

data.name: ttCanvasPointSymbols
data.value: Gives a preview of the Point symbol.

data.name: ttCheckBoxGetAltitude
data.value: Select to get the altitude for all given object points by contacting the Geonames.org server.\r\nATTENTION: When saving huge objects with many points this will be time consuming,\r\nbecause for each point a web request for the altitude must be sent!

data.name: ttCheckBoxImageFileFormatGlopus
data.value: Select to save image coordinates (e.g. maps) in a Glopus calibration file.

data.name: ttCheckBoxImageFileFormatXml
data.value: Select to save image coordinates in DiversityMobile XML format.\r\nNOTE: This selection is mandatory and cannot be changed at the moment.

data.name: ttCheckBoxSaveWorkingArea
data.value: Select to save also the working area including all visible objects as a screen shot when pressing the Save button.

data.name: ttCheckBoxShapeFileFormatArcView
data.value: Select to save the visible shapes in ArcView compatible shape files.\r\nAn appropriate index and dBase file will be created, too.

data.name: ttCheckBoxShapeFileFormatSQL
data.value: Select to save the visible shapes in MS SQL GeoObject files (ASCII).

data.name: ttComboBoxPointSymbols
data.value: List of available Point symbols. Click on a name to select it.

data.name: ttLabelPointSymbolSizeValue
data.value: Displays the current value of thePoint symbol size.

data.name: ttLabelStrokeThicknessAreaValue
data.value: Displays the current value of the Area stroke thickness.

data.name: ttLabelStrokeThicknessLineValue
data.value: Displays the current value of the Line stroke thickness.

data.name: ttLabelStrokeThicknessPointValue
data.value: Displays the current value of the Point stroke thickness.

data.name: ttSettingsSliderPointSymbolSize
data.value: Adjust the symbol size of Point objects.\r\nDouble-click to reset to default value.

data.name: ErrNoCheckBoxSelectedTrans
data.value: ERROR:\r\nYou must select at least one of the check boxes for Stroke or Fill to change the transparency!

data.name: ErrNoFillCheckBoxSelected
data.value: WARNING:\r\nYou must select Fill check box to change the transparency of an image.

data.name: ErrNoAdaptImageLoaded
data.value: ERROR:\r\nCurrently there is no map loaded to be adapted!

data.name: ErrNoCheckBoxSelectedCol
data.value: WARNING:\r\nYou must select at least one of the check boxes for Stroke or Fill to change the color!

data.name: ttCheckBoxAreaFrame
data.value: Select to show a frame which region of the working area should be saved.

data.name: ttTextBoxHeight
data.value: Height of the working area region to be saved.

data.name: ttTextBoxWidth
data.value: Width of the working area region to be saved.

data.name: ErrCreatingReferenceMap
data.value: WARNING!\r\nThe map is not aligned to north direction!\r\nA north aligned background plane will be created to host the loaded map.

data.name: InfoLabelDescription
data.value: A tool to create, visualize, edit and archive samples within a geographical map environment.

data.name: ttButtonGps
data.value: Detects and starts your GPS receiver, if available.\r\nA supported baud rate must be selected in the Settings menu.

data.name: ttComboBoxGpsBaudrates
data.value: List of available GPS baudrates. Select one appropriate rate for your GPS device.

data.name: ttSettingsRadioButtonGoogle
data.value: Selects Google Maps as online map service.

data.name: ttSettingsRadioButtonOsm
data.value: Selects Open Street Maps as online map service.

data.name: InfoLabelDisclaimerData
data.value: This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. For more details see:

data.name: InfoLabelInstitutionData
data.value: The IT Center of the Staatliche Naturwissenschaftliche Sammlungen Bayerns

data.name: InfoLabelLicenseData
data.value: This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License or later.

data.name: ttButtonProgressCancel
data.value: Press the button to cancel the current task (e.g. saving).

data.name: ttProgressBarSaveSamples
data.value: Indicates the progress of a time consuming task in %.

data.name: StrWaitForMap
data.value: Please wait until map is complete, then press YES. The results should be shown within 10 seconds. If no online map can be shown, press NO and load a local map from your computer, if available.

data.name: ErrInvalidWorld
data.value: WARNING:\r\nInconsistant map, exceeds 2 hemispheres!\r\nThe Geometry objects can not be positioned at the correct place!

data.name: SettingsLabelShapeFileReadFormat
data.value: Format of ArvView Shapes input files:

data.name: ErrNoOleDBAdapterInstalled
data.value: WARNING:\r\nThe ArcGIS dBase file will be created, but not filled up.\r\n

data.name: ttButtonDetection
data.value: Detect samples within a georeferenced picture.

data.name: ttCheckBoxShapeFileFormatImport
data.value: Select to save the visible shapes in a TAB separated text file, which could be imported later on by appropriate Applications.

data.name: DetectionLabelAdjust
data.value: Adjust minimum and maximum color values:

data.name: ErrInvalidLines
data.value: Invalid data detected in the following lines:

data.name: ErrNoOleDBAdapterForRead
data.value: WARNING:\r\nThe ArcGIS attributes of the dBase file cannot be read. Load shapes anyway?\r\n

data.name: AttributesLabelTextID
data.value: Assign selected attributes to ID or Text:

data.name: ttLabelSampleOffTransparencySampleValue
data.value: Displays the current value of the opacity of switched off objects.

data.name: ttSettingsSliderSampleOffTransparencySample
data.value: Adjust the opacity of switched off objects.\r\nDouble-click to reset to default value.
